text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium rolfsii is a species of fungus in the genus Penicillium which produces patulin.
text.Further reading:
Lee, Kok Chang; Arai, Takamitsu; Ibrahim, Darah; Kosugi, Akihiko; Prawitwong, Panida; Lan, Deng; Murata, Yoshinori; Mori, Yutaka (2014). "Purification and Characterization of a Thermostable Laminarinase from Penicillium rolfsii c3-2(1) IBRL". BioResources. 9. doi:10.15376/biores.9.1.1072-1084.
Lee, Kok Chang; Arai, Takamitsu; Ibrahim, Darah; Prawitwong, Panida; Deng, Lan; Murata, Yoshinori; Mori, Yutaka; Kosugi, Akihiko (2015). "Purification and Characterization of a Xylanase from the Newly Isolated Penicillium rolfsii c3-2(1) IBRL". BioResources. 10. doi:10.15376/biores.10.1.1627-1643.
